did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Second Baptist Church of Bath records, 1831-1879.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Second Baptist Church of Bath (Kennedyville, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume of session meeting minutes (1831-1864, 1874) with a membership list in the back and one volume of minutes of the annual meeting to elect trustees (1833-1845).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: This church was set off from the First Presbyterian Church of Bath by the Bath Presbytery on October 18, 1831. A building was erected that year. The Society diminished in number until approximately 1872, when its remaining members rejoined the First Presbyterian Church of Bath. In 1874 the remaining trustees gave the church building to the Methodist Episcopal Society.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume of session meeting minutes (1831-1864, 1874) with a membership list in the back and one volume of minutes of the annual meeting to elect trustees (1833-1845).

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: No publishing or release in such a form that any individual mentioned in the records can be identified.
